column13: "Secret Garden" is more than just a picturesque landscape; it is a vital component of urban infrastructure, providing insulation, stormwater management, and an extension to green space. By incorporating elements of nature into urban design, Dangerbridge fosters resilience, sustainability, and a deeper connection to the natural world within urban communities.

column13: GPT developed Loadflex programs, which leverage advanced algorithms and data analytics to optimise energy usage and reduce overall consumption. By implementing Loadflex programs, GPT aims to enhance sustainability, reduce environmental impact, and drive cost savings for businesses and communities.

column13: GPT's Reusable Library Bag initiative promotes sustainability by offering durable, eco-friendly bags for patrons to use when borrowing books. These bags reduce single-use plastic waste and encourage environmentally conscious behaviour among library users. By providing a convenient and sustainable alternative, GPT contributes to the conservation of resources and the protection of the environment.\t

column13: GPT's BYO-reusable coffee cup campaign encourages individuals to bring their cups when purchasing coffee, reducing single-use plastic waste. column13: Bean Cycled, a program initiated by GPT, aims to reduce waste by repurposing coffee grounds into valuable resources. Through partnerships with local businesses and recycling facilities, Bean Cycled collects used coffee grounds and transforms them into compost or biofuel. GPT's Bean Cycled initiative contributes to environmental sustainability and resource efficiency by diverting coffee waste from landfills and promoting circular economy practices.

column13: GPT pioneered EoT facilities, which are dedicated to reducing waste through innovative recycling and waste management solutions. GPT's EoT Facilities are crucial in advancing sustainability and minimising environmental impact by promoting a circular economy model and maximising resource efficiency.
